==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|りょう|しょう|yomi=on}}

===Alternative forms===
* [[諒承]]
* [[領承]]

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|了|sc=Jpan|tr=ryō||comprehend}} + {{m|ja|承|sc=Jpan|tr=shō||agree to}}

{{rfe|lang=ja|the original first character is [[諒]] but was replaced with [[了]] due to not being in the Tōyō kanji list. character glosses for [[諒]] are "excuse, forgive; guess, presume" and for [[了]] are "to finish; completed action particle"}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りょうしょう}}

# [[acknowledgment]], [[understanding]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|御了承|ごりょうしょう}}: acknowledgment, understanding
* {{ja-r|了承済み|りょうしょうずみ}}: acknowledged, accepted

# [[acknowledge]]
